title: ReBuilt Shader
briefDescription: ReBuilt Shader, a shader pack rebuild from scratch, is the successor of the famous UltraMax Shader. Using new rendering methods to create a new stunning ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
ReBuilt Shader, a shader pack rebuild from scratch, is the successor of the famous UltraMax Shader. Using new rendering methods to create a new stunning visuals at little performance cost.
Notes for Windows 10 player: Since version 1.16.200, Windows 10 shader packs in general are no longer usable. This comes down to the changed rendering engine from the old method to the new Render Dragon. Future development of this shader pack is now in hold until Render Dragon can be modded. This shader is developed during version 1.16.40. The Windows 10 version of this version of the shader is already done. If you still want to experience this shader in Windows 10, consider searching up a Windows 10 Edition version manager like this one: https://github.com/MCMrARM/mc-w10-version-launcher Please read the instructions of this launcher before using.
Screenshots of the shader.

title: Voxel Shaders
briefDescription: Ever wanted to play with Realistic shader but your devices isn't capable of doing so?Well worry no more..Because I've created a shader with ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Ever wanted to play with Realistic shader but your devices isn?t capable of doing so?
Well worry no more..
Because I?ve created a shader with high quality and vibrant color with special feature you wont find in other low end shaders!!
Voxel Shaders features amazing stuff like glowing ores, vibrant world colors and much more!!
Thanks to these people for helping me;
-I1_1212
-Wanze
-GoldShadow12
-Technical GD
-doctor2018
-INSD TEAM
This shader has a lot of interesting features that you can enable or disable in settings file!
Features;
Water waves(Can be turned On in Settings file)
Water waves = ON
Water waves = OFF
Realistic Caustic (Can be turned On in Settings file)
Vignette(Can be turned On in Settings file)
Sun Reflection on grass and water(Can be turned On in Settings file)

Sun Reflection on Metallic Blocks(Can be turned On in Settings file)
~All the sun reflection features only appear when sunset/sunrise
Glowing Ores(Can be turned On in Settings file)

Normalmapping (3d Blocks)
(More Feature available on setting.h file)
!*Attention*!
I have asked Permission from every dev shader that i?ve used their code!
Glowing Ores and Metallic Detection
~Wanze(Hspe Shader Dev)

Torch Code Base
~GoldShadow12

Water and Caustic
~ By Me (DriftyzOfficial)
Normalmapping
~ By (@Sana)

title: Psycho ? PvP Texture Pack
briefDescription: Psycho is a simple, good looking pack. This pack adds smaller swords, a bow charge indicator, outlined ores, clear water, night vision, new apples, smoother ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Psycho is a simple, good looking pack. This pack adds smaller swords, a bow charge indicator, outlined ores, clear water, night vision, new apples, smoother stone texture and much more.
If you have suggestions, you can write a comment and maybe it will be in the next pack.Hope you like this new pvp resource pack!

title: Carbon Shaders MCPE

crawledImageUrls.text:
This shader is made for low end devices (1-2 GB ram)who want something new and wanna replace the vanilla on their low end device this shader could run easily on those devices with getting 30+ fps
I Hope you like it
MY YT
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzm38YFIsZ5qYJ3f0sBWdrA
This shader is made by me with the help of several tutorials on YouTube.
MADE IN INDIA
features
-custom tonemap/environment
-waving plant & water
-sun reflection
-normal Shadow & side block shadow
-lighting color
-natural fog
-transparent water
-underwater wave
All GPU supported
Name of devices on which shader is tested
-Realme C3
-Samsung M31
-Motorola G2 (1 gig ram supported)
Supported Platforms
-Android
-IOS (not tested)
NOTE ? WINDOWS 10 NOT SUPPORTED
I have a. Pc but it?s like 12yr old so cannot run mcbe on it (Not even java??)

title: JustWavingLeaves (NoLag) (1.16)
briefDescription: These "shaders" make some plants, tree leaves, and plants wave.These waves are made to look as realistic as possible, not too exaggerated or too ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
These ?shaders? make some plants, tree leaves, and plants wave.
These waves are made to look as realistic as possible, not too exaggerated or too subtle.
Also, they are compatible with any texture package
Remember to report bugs!

title: Vanilla Quality Unlimiter
briefDescription: When using a texture pack, sacrifice performance for quality: This shader doesn't add anything new. Instead it removes the limits placed on the default vanilla ...

crawledImageUrls.text: When using a texture pack, sacrifice performance for quality: This shader doesn?t add anything new. Instead it removes the limits placed on the default vanilla shader to fix common graphical issues with distant water and plant textures when using certain texture packs, and allows you to set a lower mipmap blur level to keep the details in high-resolution texture packs.

title: 8-bit Shader
briefDescription: This shader will change the look to be an 8-bit retro style that only has 256 colors consisting of : 8 red x 8 green x 4 blue.Enjoy playing ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This shader will change the look to be an 8-bit retro style that only has 256 colors consisting of : 8 red x 8 green x 4 blue.
Enjoy playing in the retro style!
This shader is supported with mobile device but not tried on Windows 10.
You can also combine with your own texture pack.
Colors Information
